page.title: 20SCHOOLS, DERVOCK.
page.content:
In our block there are 2 primary schools{William Pinkerton Memorial(112 {pupils)}and{Kirkhills(15pupils).}The {Wm Pinkerton}is named after the chairman of the school committee who died soon after it was completed. Built in 1952 in 4 acres; planted with flowers, shrubs and trees, it has a football pitch; an 8 lane, 80m track; and large lawns in front.{Kirkhills}is built on a hill near the site of an old Scottish church or kirk _ so its name.It is due to close in 1986, due to falling rolls. *****************
